long_description: The tablet-size REI Tech Wrap sleeve has a soft, sleek profile and is designed to offer versatile protection for your 10 in. tablet. It also meets TSA requirements with a checkpoint-friendly design. Zippered design secures contents during travel; sleeve butterflies open for aiport security screening, eliminating the need to fully remove tablet. Sleek and flexible interior sleeve provides protection for your 10 in. tablet. Interior includes slim file pocket to organize documents while on the go. Front pocket includes organization for pens, flash drive, and power cords or accessories. Haul handles on top let you tote sleeve with ease; attachment points allow use of optional shoulder strap (sold separately). Durable materials and padding provide lightweight protection for even the most adventurous travelers.
short_description: The tablet-size REI Tech Wrap sleeve has a soft, sleek profile and is designed to offer versatile protection for your 10 in. tablet. It also meets TSA requirements with a checkpoint-friendly design.
